# QUIC.TLS

**Structure**

The set of TLS options available when using QUIC.

## Declaration

```swift
struct TLS
```

## Overview

Used to configure the TLS handshake that runs within the QUIC handshake.

## Instance Methods

- **certificateValidator(_:)**: Set a block to provide custom verification of the peer’s credentials during the TLS handshake.
- **cipherSuites(_:)**: Set TLS cipher suites to the set of enabled ciphersuites.
- **ciphersuiteGroups(_:)**: Set TLS cipher suite groups to the set of enabled ciphersuites.
- **localIdentity(_:)**: Set the local identity TLS uses during the QUIC handshake.
- **peerAuthentication(_:)**: Specify a preference for how to authenticate the peer.
